messages.text: You are unique and special just the way you are.
You have the power to learn and grow every day.
Your thoughts and ideas are important.
You can face challenges with courage and perseverance.
You are capable of making friends and connecting with others.
You can express yourself in unique and creative ways.
You are loved and accepted for who you are.
You have the strength to overcome any obstacles.
You are a valuable and important part of your community.
You can learn and achieve great things at your own pace.
